name: Trow's Space
description:
In this 2D pixel-style game, take control of a spaceship and face enemy motherships. Your goal is to destroy their towers with precise bursts of gunfire. However, it won't be easy as the motherships are armed and will attack you relentlessly. They will periodically summon small ships that will chase you without rest.

As you progress in the game, you will encounter obstacles like asteroids or satellites that you must dodge to survive. But be cautious, as deadly black holes will also appear. Keep your reflexes sharp and your ship well-armed to overcome all the challenges that come your way.

By destroying all the motherships in a level, you will advance to the next, where the difficulty will significantly increase. Prepare to face more aggressive enemies, better-protected towers, and challenges that will test your piloting skills.

Are you ready to embark on this exciting, action-packed space adventure? Show your prowess and achieve glory as the top space pilot in this retro 2D-style game!
